module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: sourcetype="sguild" classification!="{}" | fields src_ip dest_ip dest_port detection_engine proto classification severity name | chart count by $field_select$

module.name: HiddenSearch
module.param: sourcetype="bro_notice" | fields src_ip dest_ip note msg actions proto src_port dest_port | chart count by $field_select$

list.param: eventtype="ossec" NOT tag::eventtype=noise | fields reporting_host src_ip severity signature user | top signature
eventtype=ossec | fields reporting_host src_ip severity signature user | top reporting_host
eventtype=ossec | fields reporting_host src_ip severity signature user | top severity
eventtype=ossec | fields reporting_host src_ip severity signature user | top src_ip
eventtype=ossec | fields reporting_host src_ip severity signature user | top user

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="sguild" | geoip dest_ip | chart count sparkline dc(src_ip) as src_count dc(dest_ip) as dest_count values(dest_ip_country_name) as dest_ip_country_name values(severity) as severity $sguild_chart_by$ | sort count + desc

module.name: GenericHeader
module.param: Selected Event Details by Source IP

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="sguild" $click.name$="$click.value$" | geoip dest_ip | stats values(dest_port) as dest_port sparkline count values(dest_ip_country_name) as dest_ip_country_name values(severity) as severity values(name) as name values(classification) as classification by src_ip dest_ip

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="sguild" (src_ip="$click.fields.src_ip$" AND dest_ip="$click.fields.dest_ip$") | geoip dest_ip | chart values(dest_ip) as dest_ip sparkline count values(dest_port) as dest_port values(dest_ip_country_name) as dest_ip_country_name values(severity) as severity values(proto) as proto by src_ip

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="bro_conn" | fields src_ip dest_ip dest_port orig_bytes resp_bytes orig_cc resp_cc service proto conn_desc | $bytes_by$ by $bytes_sort_by$

module.name: GenericHeader
module.param: Selected Event Details by Destination IP

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="bro_conn" $bytes_sort_by$="$click.name2$" | stats values(dest_port) as dest_port sparkline count values(orig_bytes) as orig_bytes values(resp_bytes) as resp_bytes values(orig_cc) as orig_cc values(resp_cc) as resp_cc values(service) as service values(conn_state) as conn_state values(conn_desc) as conn_desc by src_ip dest_ip

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="bro_conn" (src_ip="$click.fields.src_ip$" AND dest_ip="$click.fields.dest_ip$") | geoip dest_ip | chart values(dest_ip) as dest_ip sparkline count values(dest_port) as dest_port values(dest_ip_country_name) as dest_ip_country_name values(cif_confidence) as cif_confidence values(proto) as proto by src_ip

module.name: Search
module.param: search sourcetype="bro_http" | regex uri="\.exe|\.bat|\.bin|\.cmd|\.doc|\.jar|\.pdf|\.rtf|\.xls|\.zip|\.rar|\.7z" | fields src_ip dest_ip domain filename mime_type user_agent uri status_msg | stats count by $http_by$

module.name: GenericHeader
module.param: Selected Event Details by Source IP

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="bro_http" $click.name$="$click.value$" | regex uri="\.exe|\.bat|\.bin|\.cmd|\.doc|\.jar|\.pdf|\.rtf|\.sh|\.xls|\.zip|\.rar|\.7z" | geoip dest_ip | fields uid src_ip dest_ip filename dest_ip_country_name mime_type domain uri status_msg user_agent file_extension | chart sparkline count values(dest_ip) as dest_ip values(dest_port) as dest_port values(mime_type) as mime_type values(dest_ip_country_name) as dest_ip_country_name values(domain) as domain values(uri) as uri values(user_agent) as user_agent values(uid) as uid by src_ip

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="bro_http" src_ip="$click.fields.src_ip$" | regex uri="\.exe|\.bat|\.bin|\.cmd|\.doc|\.jar|\.pdf|\.rtf|\.sh|\.xls|\.zip|\.rar|\.7z" | geoip dest_ip | chart values(dest_ip) as dest_ip sparkline count values(dest_port) as dest_port values(mime_type) as mime_type values(filename) as filename values(dest_ip_country_name) as dest_ip_country_name values(domain) as domain values(status_msg) as status_msg values(user_agent) as user_agent by src_ip

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="bro_ssl" | chart sparkline count dc(src_ip) as src_ip_count dc(dest_ip) as dest_ip_count values(version) as version by $ssl_by$

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="bro_ssl" $click.name$="$click.value$" | stats sparkline count values(dest_port) as dest_port values(O) as O values(CN) as CN values(validation_status) as validation_status values(C) as C values(issuer_subject) as issuer_subject values(dest_ip_country_name) as dest_ip_country_name by src_ip dest_ip

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="bro_ssl" (src_ip="$click.fields.src_ip$" AND dest_ip="$click.fields.dest_ip$") O="$click.fields.O$" | geoip dest_ip | chart values(dest_ip) as dest_ip sparkline count values(dest_port) as dest_port values(O) as O values(CN) as CN values(issuer_subject) as issuer_subject values(validation_status) as validation_status values(C) as C values(dest_ip_country_name) as dest_ip_country_name by by src_ip

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="bro_software" | chart sparkline count dc(src_ip) as src_ip_count values(unparsed_version) as unparsed_version by $software_by$

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="bro_software" $software_by$="$click.value$" | stats sparkline count values(software_type) as software_type values(unparsed_version) as unparsed_version by src_ip name

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="bro_software" src_ip="$click.fields.src_ip$" name="$click.fields.name$" | stats sparkline count values(software_type) as sofware_type values(unparsed_version) as unparsed_version by src_ip

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype=$dns_source$ | rex field=domain "(?<tld>\.[a-zA-Z]+$$)" | fields tld src_ip dest_ip dest_port proto | chart sparkline count values(dest_port) as dest_port values(proto) as proto by tld

module.name: GenericHeader
module.param: Selected Event Details by Source IP

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="$dns_source$" domain="*$click.fields.tld$" | geoip dest_ip | stats values(dest_port) as dest_port sparkline count values(domain) as domain values(dest_ip_country_name) as dest_ip_country_name values(proto) as proto by src_ip dest_ip

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="$dns_source$" (src_ip="$click.fields.src_ip$" AND dest_ip="$click.fields.dest_ip$") domain="*$click.fields.tld$" | geoip dest_ip | chart values(dest_ip) as dest_ip sparkline count values(dest_port) as dest_port values(dest_ip_country_name) as dest_ip_country_name values(sourcetype) as sourcetype values(_raw) as _raw by src_ip

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype=bro_dns query!="-" query!="*.arpa" query!="*.malware.hash.cymru.com" | search NOT [ inputcsv domains_visited.csv | fields query ] | chart sparkline count dc(dest_ip) as dest_ip by $anomalous_source$

module.name: GenericHeader
module.param: Selected Event Details by Source IP

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="bro_dns" $click.name$="$click.value$" | geoip dest_ip | stats values(dest_port) as dest_port sparkline count values(domain) as domain values(dest_ip_country_name) as dest_ip_country_name values(proto) as proto by src_ip dest_ip

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="bro_dns" (src_ip="$click.fields.src_ip$" AND dest_ip="$click.fields.dest_ip$") | geoip dest_ip | chart values(dest_ip) as dest_ip sparkline count values(dest_port) as dest_port values(dest_ip_country_name) as dest_ip_country_name values(sourcetype) as sourcetype values(_raw) as _raw by src_ip

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="$cif_select$" cif_severity="*" | chart count values(src_ip) as src_ip values(cif_severity) as cif_severity values(cif_confidence) as cif_confidence values(cif_description) as cif_description by dest_ip

module.name: GenericHeader
module.param: Selected Event Details by Source IP

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="$cif_select$" cif_severity="*" | geoip dest_ip | stats values(dest_port) as dest_port sparkline count values(dest_ip_country_name) as dest_ip_country_name values(severity) as severity values(proto) as proto by src_ip dest_ip

module.name: Search
module.param: sourcetype="$cif_select$" (src_ip="$click.fields.src_ip$" AND dest_ip="$click.fields.dest_ip$") cif_severity="*" | geoip dest_ip | chart values(dest_ip) as dest_ip sparkline count values(dest_port) as dest_port values(dest_ip_country_name) as dest_ip_country_name values(cif_severity) as cif_severity by src_ip
